oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Historical Photographic Plate Image Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GAVO Data Center
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
GAVO's historical photographic plate archive (GHHPA) is a collection of various digitized historical photographic plates. It currently exposes:
* the scans of plates of selected Kapteyn special fields obtained at Potsdam * the Palomar-Leiden Trojan surveys, 1960-1977, * a collection of plates obtained at Boyden Station, South Africa, kept at various German observatories.
Other plate collections kept by GAVO include the Heidelberg Digitized Astronomical Plates HDAP, ivo://org.gavo.dc/lswscans/res/positions/siap, and the APPLAUSE database from Potsdam.
